fullplot: Dr. Joe Darrow is a recently widowed doctor. He is grieving due to the death of his pregnant wife in a Red Cross mission in Venezuela. Although being atheist, he began to believe that his dead wife wants to communicate with him, through her young patients in the Pediatrics of a Chicago hospital.
plot: A grieving doctor is being contacted by his late wife through his patients near death experiences.
title: Dragonfly

tomatoes.consensus: Sappy, dull, and muddled, Dragonfly is too melancholic and cliched to generate much suspense.
